string-array.name: tips
string-array.item: قواعد\n القاعدة الوحيدة في روم سيانوجين. لاتسأل عن متى سيكون الاصدار بالتحديد
"Trascina le applicazioni sulla schermata Home."\n" Tocca e tieni premuta un\'applicazione finché non vibra."
"Riorganizza la schermata Home."\n" Tieni premuto un elemento e quando vibra trascinalo dove vuoi."
Ballmer Peak\n Optimal coding ability takes place between a BAC of .129 and .138.
"Rimuovi gli elementi."\n" Tieni premuto un elemento e quando vibra trascinalo sull\'icona Cestino. @drawable/trash"
آيفون\n حملك له خطأ. هذا هو الواقع
"Schermate Home multiple."\n" Scorri a sinistra o a destra per passare da una all\'altra. Trascina elementi in altre schermate."
Number 1 Priority\n Don\'t forget to keep your winzip up to date.
"Done with this widget?\n Touch & hold it and when it vibrates, drag it to the Trash icon.Done with this widget?\n Touch & hold it and when it vibrates, drag it to the Trash icon."
Kang [kayng] - (verb)\n Upgraded my winzip br0. Thanks to my patient lady putting up with my devvin. @drawable/kang_truck
